## ManagedDisk Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The ManagedDisk resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Create<wbr>Option</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The method to use when creating the managed disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Possible values include:
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Resource<wbr>Group<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the Resource Group where the Managed Disk should exist.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Storage<wbr>Account<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of storage to use for the managed disk. Possible values are `Standard_LRS`, `Premium_LRS`, `StandardSSD_LRS` or `UltraSSD_LRS`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Set<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of a Disk Encryption Set which should be used to encrypt this Managed Disk.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Iops<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The number of IOPS allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. One operation can transfer between 4k and 256k bytes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Mbps<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The bandwidth allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. MBps means millions of bytes per second.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Size<wbr>Gb</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the size of the managed disk to create in gigabytes. If `create_option` is `Copy` or `FromImage`, then the value must be equal to or greater than the source's size. The size can only be increased.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Encryption<wbr>Settings</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#manageddiskencryptionsettings">Managed<wbr>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Settings<wbr>Args</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A `encryption_settings` block as defined below.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Image<wbr>Reference<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of an existing platform/marketplace disk image to copy when `create_option` is `FromImage`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Location</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specified the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the name of the Managed Disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Os<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specify a value when the source of an `Import` or `Copy` operation targets a source that contains an operating system. Valid values are `Linux` or `Windows`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Resource<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of an existing Managed Disk to copy `create_option` is `Copy` or the recovery point to restore when `create_option` is `Restore`
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>URI to a valid VHD file to be used when `create_option` is `Import`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Storage<wbr>Account<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of the Storage Account where the `source_uri` is located. Required when `create_option` is set to `Import`.  Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Zones</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A collection containing the availability zone to allocate the Managed Disk in.
</dd>

</dl>

        <span>disk<wbr>Iops<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The number of IOPS allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. One operation can transfer between 4k and 256k bytes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>disk<wbr>Mbps<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The bandwidth allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. MBps means millions of bytes per second.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>disk<wbr>Size<wbr>Gb</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the size of the managed disk to create in gigabytes. If `create_option` is `Copy` or `FromImage`, then the value must be equal to or greater than the source's size. The size can only be increased.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>encryption<wbr>Settings</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#manageddiskencryptionsettings">Managed<wbr>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Settings</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A `encryption_settings` block as defined below.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>image<wbr>Reference<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of an existing platform/marketplace disk image to copy when `create_option` is `FromImage`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>location</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specified the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the name of the Managed Disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>os<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specify a value when the source of an `Import` or `Copy` operation targets a source that contains an operating system. Valid values are `Linux` or `Windows`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>source<wbr>Resource<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of an existing Managed Disk to copy `create_option` is `Copy` or the recovery point to restore when `create_option` is `Restore`
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>source<wbr>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>URI to a valid VHD file to be used when `create_option` is `Import`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>storage<wbr>Account<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of the Storage Account where the `source_uri` is located. Required when `create_option` is set to `Import`.  Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">{[key: string]: string}</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>zones</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A collection containing the availability zone to allocate the Managed Disk in.
</dd>

</dl>




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>create_<wbr>option</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The method to use when creating the managed disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Possible values include:
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>resource_<wbr>group_<wbr>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the Resource Group where the Managed Disk should exist.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>storage_<wbr>account_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of storage to use for the managed disk. Possible values are `Standard_LRS`, `Premium_LRS`, `StandardSSD_LRS` or `UltraSSD_LRS`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>disk_<wbr>encryption_<wbr>set_<wbr>id</span>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</dd>

</dd>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

        <span>Location</span>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specified the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the name of the Managed Disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Os<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specify a value when the source of an `Import` or `Copy` operation targets a source that contains an operating system. Valid values are `Linux` or `Windows`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Resource<wbr>Group<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the Resource Group where the Managed Disk should exist.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Resource<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of an existing Managed Disk to copy `create_option` is `Copy` or the recovery point to restore when `create_option` is `Restore`
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Source<wbr>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>URI to a valid VHD file to be used when `create_option` is `Import`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Storage<wbr>Account<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of the Storage Account where the `source_uri` is located. Required when `create_option` is set to `Import`.  Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Storage<wbr>Account<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of storage to use for the managed disk. Possible values are `Standard_LRS`, `Premium_LRS`, `StandardSSD_LRS` or `UltraSSD_LRS`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Zones</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A collection containing the availability zone to allocate the Managed Disk in.
</dd>

</dl>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The method to use when creating the managed disk. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Possible values include:
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Set<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ID of a Disk Encryption Set which should be used to encrypt this Managed Disk.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Iops<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The number of IOPS allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. One operation can transfer between 4k and 256k bytes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Mbps<wbr>Read<wbr>Write</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The bandwidth allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. MBps means millions of bytes per second.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Disk<wbr>Size<wbr>Gb</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the size of the managed disk to create in gigabytes. If `create_option` is `Copy` or `FromImage`, then the value must be equal to or greater than the source's size. The size can only be increased.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

## Supporting Types


<h4 id="manageddiskencryptionsettings">Managed<wbr>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Settings</h4>

<h4 id="manageddiskencryptionsettingsdiskencryptionkey">Managed<wbr>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Settings<wbr>Disk<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Key</h4>

<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Secret<wbr>Url</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
